snippet: Republicans united against a bill that would make it easier for women to sue employers for pay discrimination.
abstract: Republicans unite against a measure that would make it easier for women to litigate their way to pay equality; bill sought to bar companies from retaliating against workers who inquire about pay disparities and open pathways for female employees to sue for punitive damages in cases of paycheck discrimination.
lead_paragraph: Republicans united against a bill that would make it easier for women to sue employers for pay discrimination.

headline.seo: Senate Republicans Block Pay Equity Bill
headline.main: Senate Republicans Again Block Pay Equity Bill
headline.print_headline: Republicans Block Bill To Ease Suits Over Pay Bias
